QuestData.Title: Open Orientation
QuestData.Description:
You have done much for the Dragon Isles, hero.
There are many who are grateful for your contributions and want to welcome you more wholly into their communities. Go to them and orient yourselves with each group and their specialties.
I think you will find that just as you have much to offer the Dragon Isles, many here have much they wish to offer you in return!
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Orientation quests in each major faction hub: Dragonscale Basecamp, Maruukai, Iskaara, and Valdrakken.
QuestData.RewardText:
You've met everyone? Excellent. Maybe they will stop sending me emissaries, then.
I hope you will continue to strengthen the bonds you have made with these communities. You have only to benefit each other.
